title: Tired of your god awful servers.
body:
Tired of getting "ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT" every fucking game since your champion mastery patch. Fix your shtty servers.

And no its not my internet. I have tested my internet stability DURING one of these games.

replies.body:
Directly after the patch I got a huge spike of ping for two three games, but not quite disconnecting. It might of been a coincidence, it may have legitimately fixed the issue, but I did a google search and from that did two things. 
1. Run CMD and type "ipconfig/flushdns"
2. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3836465&page=1#post41290028

Anyways, after those two things took my ping from a 200-1000 back to my usual 30-100.
Although I haven't been dcing, there has DEFINITELY been more lag and client problems since that patch

Clearly the issue IS on your end or there'd be a lot more people mentioning it. Seems like the firewall problems i used to have (either your computer or router firewall) so you could try with them off to see if its that. Otherwise send support a ticket and they can help figure it out

Must be you, not many others seem to have this issue.

Do you use a VPN?
